title: Return of the Psammead
brief_description: When Ellie, Pip, George and Lucy stumble across the Psammead, the Sand Fairy with the amazing ability to grant wishes, they embark on a series of colourful adventures. From naughty twin sisters who appear from nowhere,to glimpses of the future and a grumpy Great Aunt who changes into a mischievous playmate, the four children are whisked into a world of absolute magic where anything is possible. The story by Helen Cresswell is based upon the novels by E. Nesbit.
